body:
Also for the next round, please consider adding IrfanView, Autodesk 3ds
Max, Autodesk Radiance Image Viewer (a member of the Ecotect suite), and
Zumtobel Vivaldi.




David Smith, IES, EIT, Design Member of the IALD
